channel.title: Crescent Moon [1/4]
channel.description:
Crescent Moon ☾ is "a feelings-delving role-playing game of brave children and bold adventures". It's based on the Forged in the Dark system but is a mostly non-violent game about collecting memories and piecing together the story of the patchwork dream world that you find yourselves journeying through. It's sweet and sad and whimsical. You can learn more about the game from it's [itch page](https://stardrift-design.itch.io/crescentmoon).
This will be my first time running the game. You don't need to know the rules, everything will be taught in play. There will be 4 sessions in Feb in total. The first session will be like a session zero and then three sessions of play. You must RSVP to all sessions you'd like to attend.
We'll be playing over Streamyard but the game won't be recorded. We'll be using Lines & Veils, the X Card and Open Table as safety tools. And the game will follow the Gauntlet Code of Conduct.
